name: Viral Quest
description:
Viral Quest is a platformer where players control a virus, moving through the body to cause as much damage as possible, all while avoiding the body’s many defenses. Players will destroy certain objects to make progress, use the body’s terrain to their advantage, and find ways to escape the defenses set up to stop the virus’ advance. Through completing these platforming challenges and also solving puzzles to outsmart the body’s defenses, players will be challenged and suitably entertained by the game’s subtle problem-solving, but also intense scrapes.

Credits:

Level Design -Victor Do
